name: A Conga's Tale
description:
Congas are a very particular species. In general they are peaceful, kind, caring and occasionally stubborn. They are all the masters of their own particular handicraft and don't waste time showing others what they can do. Caiks are the male version of Congas, and very often live apart.

A Conga's Tale is a story told about one Conga in particular, Cassia. Cassia is a Chef Conga who plays her part in getting the town of Conga's Bay ready for King Dancaik and St Conga's arrival. Their new son, Ry-caik has been born, but not everything goes to plan...
